rows.label: tlk70000004_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, old Bry sure looked happy. Seeing
Laura and Shin like that, he said they
reminded him of that Ornella.

rows.label: tlk70000004_04_msg0002
rows.name:
And I can see you all have pretty
strong bonds between Blades and Drivers.
Even a Iiran like me can see that!

rows.label: tlk70000004_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Having a new Knight of Iira is always a
happy occasion, but I'm even happier that
it was Laura getting the accolade!
